name: .CLF
summary: Learn about .CLF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a CLF file in Caesium (Windows). To do so, select File â†’ Open List... from Caesium's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your CLF file.

If you do not have access to Caesium, or you just want to see the plain text information your CLF file contains, you can also open the file in any text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows) or Apple TextEdit (Mac).

images.alt: Screenshot of a .clf file in SaeraSoft Caesium
images.caption: CLF file open in SaeraSoft Caesium
